title: The Stanislaski Sisters: Natasha and Rachel
description: Though they were raised in the Old World traditions of their loving immigrant family, tempestuous Natasha and cool, classy Rachel are ready for a new world of love.... Stormy Natasha's wild, fiery beauty captivates Spencer Kimball. But will the handsome single dad prove the one man capable of breaching her well-fortified heart and Taming Natasha?When rugged Zack Muldoon needs a tough, no-nonsense lawyer, Rachel's not what he has in mindÂ— till he discovers there's more to this long-legged beauty than meets the eye.and finds himself Falling for Rachel.
author: Nora Roberts
